Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Subcode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Module" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ModuleBase" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ModuleAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="MemAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="MemModule" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessStartTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ThreadId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Url" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Zone" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InputFile" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InputFileMD5" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InputFileSHA1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Subcode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ReturnAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CalledAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="TargetAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="StackAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="FrameAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ReturnAddressModule" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HookedAPI" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ProcessStartTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ThreadId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Url" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Zone" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InputFile" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InputFileMD5" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InputFileSHA1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
